requirements.summary: Create student data entry form with name, email, and UID input fields
acceptanceCriteria: Form displays three input fields labeled Name, Email, and UID
Submit button adds the student record to the backend
Form validates that all fields are filled before submission

file_operations.description: Create a React component with controlled input fields for name, email, and uid. Include validation to ensure all fields are filled before allowing submission. Call backend.addStudent() on form submit and clear form on success. Use shadcn-ui Input and Button components for consistent styling.

Create a custom hook to manage student data operations. Implement methods to fetch all students using backend.getAllStudents(), add a student using backend.addStudent(), and update a student using backend.updateStudent(). Include loading and error state management.

requirements.summary: Display student list with edit functionality for each record
acceptanceCriteria: Student records display in a clear, organized format
Each record shows name, email, and UID fields
Edit button is present for each student record
Clicking edit allows modification of student data
Changes save to the backend and update the display

file_operations.description: Create a component that displays all student records in a card-based layout. Each card shows name, email, and uid fields with an edit button. Use shadcn-ui Card components for consistent styling. When edit is clicked, populate an edit form or enable inline editing. Fetch students using the useStudents hook.

Create a component for editing existing student records. Pre-populate fields with current student data. Call backend.updateStudent() with the uid and updated name and email on submit. Include validation and success/error feedback. Use shadcn-ui Input and Button components.

requirements.summary: Ensure all features are publicly accessible without authentication
acceptanceCriteria: All features (add, edit, view) are accessible immediately
No authentication barriers or user management present

file_operations.description: Wire StudentForm and StudentList components into the main App component. Ensure all features are immediately accessible without authentication checks. Arrange components in a single-page layout that displays the form and list together.

requirements.summary: Apply warm educational theme with earthy tones and clean typography
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color scheme using warm, educational tones
Student records presented in organized card or table format
Interface feels welcoming and appropriate for educational data management

file_operations.description: Update the global stylesheet to use a warm educational color palette featuring terracotta (#E07A5F or similar) and sage green (#81B29A or similar) as primary colors. Ensure clean, readable typography with appropriate font sizes and spacing for educational content.

Configure Tailwind theme to include custom colors for the educational theme: terracotta for primary actions, sage green for secondary elements, and warm neutral backgrounds. Define typography settings that enhance readability for data management interfaces.
